name: Beat Hop 3D Dancing Music Ball
description:
Want play top chart, drak, malone, billie songs in a hop game? Or any song you want, search any youtube song to play.

Now you can play songs from youtube.

How to play

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tile.
2. Don't Miss the Tile
3. Play next round with speed increase and never stop
4. Enjoy the awesome music and endless challenges designed for each song.

The Ball will jump on the Beats. Listen to the beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tile to tile.

Game features
- Top songs in the chart and update weekly
- Search any youtube song you want to play
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Endless round for each song
- Good 3D visual and effects
- 100+ beautiful and fun songs to relax
- 6 Different backgrounds color to bring you a new experience every plays!
- Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls
- Compare your score with worldwide players on the ranking list!

Bounce off the music tiles, listen to the beat, and make as many hops as you can in this music game!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.
